sx.blah.discord.handle.obj

Class Channel

  • java.lang.Object
    • sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.Channel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrivateChannel

    public class Channel
extends Object
    Defines a text channel in a guild/server.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected IDiscordClient client
      The client that created this object.
      protected String id
      Channel ID.
      protected boolean isPrivate
      Indicates whether or not this channel is a PM channel.
      protected AtomicBoolean isTyping
      Whether the bot should send out a typing status
      protected String lastReadMessageID
      The last read message.
      protected List<Message> messages
      Messages that have been sent into this channel
      protected String name
      User-friendly channel name (e.g.
      protected Guild parent
      The guild this channel belongs to.
      protected static long TIME_FOR_TYPE_STATUS
      5 seconds, the time it takes for one typing status to "wear off"
      protected String topic
      The channel's topic message.
      protected AtomicLong typingTimer
      Keeps track of the time to handle repeated typing status broadcasts

        Gets the guild this channel is a part of.
        Returns:
        The guild.

      • isPrivate

        public boolean isPrivate()
        Gets whether or not this channel is a private one–if it is a private one, this object is an instance of PrivateChannel.
        Returns:
        True if the channel is private, false if otherwise.

      • getTopic

        public String getTopic()
        Gets the topic for the channel.
        Returns:
        The channel topic (null if not set).

public void setTopic(String topic)

        Sets the CACHED topic for the channel.
        Parameters:
        topic - The new channel topic

        public String mention()
        Formats a string to be able to #mention this channel.

        The formatted string.

      • sendMessage

        public Message sendMessage(String content)
        Sends a message without tts to the desired channel.
        Parameters:
        content - The content of the message.
        Returns:
        The message object representing the sent message

      • sendMessage

        public Message sendMessage(String content,
                           boolean tts)
        Sends a message to the desired channel.
        Parameters:
        content - The content of the message.
        tts - Whether the message should use tts or not.
        Returns:
        The message object representing the sent message

      • sendFile

        public Message sendFile(File file)
                 throws HTTP403Exception,
                        IOException
        Sends a file to the channel.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to send.
        Returns:
        The message sent.
        Throws:
        HTTP403Exception
        IOException

      • createInvite

        public Invite createInvite(int maxAge,
                           int maxUses,
                           boolean temporary,
                           boolean useXkcdPass)
        Generates an invite for this channel.
        Parameters:
        maxAge - How long the invite should be valid, setting it to 0 makes it last forever.
        maxUses - The maximum uses for the invite, setting it to 0 makes the invite have unlimited uses.
        temporary - Whether users admitted with this invite are temporary.
        useXkcdPass - Whether to generate a human-readable code, maxAge cannot be 0 for this to work.
        Returns:
        The newly generated invite.

      • toggleTypingStatus

        public void toggleTypingStatus()
        Toggles whether the bot is "typing".

      • getTypingStatus

        public boolean getTypingStatus()
        Gets whether the bot is "typing".
        Returns:
        True if the bot is typing, false if otherwise.
